This suggests that after the 2000-01 season, the team changed its location. The move would have happened between the end of the 2000-01 season and the start of the 2001-02 season. Typically, such moves occur in the summer before the next season starts, which is around June or July 2001.

So, according to the table, the Grizzlies were based in Vancouver up until the 2000-01 season and then became the Memphis Grizzlies starting from the 2001-02 season. The claim specifies that the move happened in 2001, which aligns with this information because the relocation would have occurred before the 2001-02 season started.
